title: The Best Spas in Europe, From Swiss Clinics to Greek Retreats
author: Condé Nast; Emma Love
description: The continent has abundant options where you can restart, relax, and reboot.
cleaned_text: Spa Guide The Best Spas in Europe, From Swiss Clinics to Greek Retreats The continent has abundant options where you can restart, relax, and reboot. A [Europe](https://www.cntraveler.com/destinations/europe) [spa break](https://www.cntraveler.com/inspiration/wellness-and-spas) is a great way to physically and emotionally reboot—often through a customized combination of hi-tech health tests by expert doctors, feel-good massages, and a refined diet, all in a stunning back-to-nature setting. Of course, finding the best spa really depends on what you're looking for—do you want a retreat, where you can really get away from it all, or would you rather a chic spa housed in a hotel, where you can float in and out of your treatments with ease? Whether for cutting-edge treatments that tackle a specific issue such as insomnia or stress, or a cosseting retreat that rebalances and energizes, this is our pick of the top game-changing spas in Europe that really deliver on wellness.
